scripts.migrate:pg: PGHOST=localhost PGUSER=postgres PGPASSWORD=postgres PGPORT=5432 PGDATABASE=study_app npx node-pg-migrate -m db/migrations up
scripts.migrate:down:pg: PGHOST=localhost PGUSER=postgres PGPASSWORD=postgres PGPORT=5432 PGDATABASE=study_app npx node-pg-migrate -m db/migrations down
scripts.dev:with-migrate: PGHOST=localhost PGUSER=postgres PGPASSWORD=postgres PGPORT=5432 PGDATABASE=study_app npx node-pg-migrate -m db/migrations up && nodemon src/server.js
